citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:50pm on 1 March
2022. Spoke with facility representative by phone and she stated they were out of town and unable to do the inspection at
this time.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:50pm on 1 March 
2022. Spoke with facility representative by phone and she stated they were out of town and unable to do the inspection at 
this time. 
 
 
 
End Section
